name: Pixel Battlefield
description:
Pixel Battlefield is a player versus player action game in which up to 30 players fight in a battle, a type of large-scale last man standing deathmatch where players fight to remain the last alive.
Each match starts with players parachuting from a plane onto a map area approximately 2 × 2 kilometres in size.
The plane's flight path across the map varies with each round, requiring players to quickly determine the best time to eject and parachute to the ground.
Once players land, They can search buildings and other sites to find weapons, armor, and other equipment.

-Support Single and Multiplayer.
-Weapons and armour randomly appeared on the map.
-Real time map view.
-Multi-language support.
-Support the first person and the third person perspective.
-Multi weapon switch.
